name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BlurZilla — Blur text in one click

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A program for blurring text and images in a browser. Allows you to anonymize your data and hide it from prying eyes.
short.uk: Програма для розмивання тексту та зображень у браузері. Дозволяє зробити ваші дані анонімними та сховати їх від сторонніх очей.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing BlurZilla, your ultimate Google Chrome browser extension for safeguarding sensitive information online. BlurZilla offers seamless text blurring functionality, empowering users to obscure confidential data effortlessly. With a simple right-click, select the elements you wish to conceal, and BlurZilla diligently remembers your preferences, ensuring persistent blurring across page reloads. Hover over obscured elements to reveal their content instantly, maintaining productivity without compromising security.

Features:
✓ Effortless Blurring: Easily conceal sensitive text on websites with a quick right-click selection.
✓ Persistent Protection: BlurZilla remembers your chosen elements, ensuring continued privacy even after page refresh.
✓ Instant Content Preview: Hover over blurred text to swiftly unveil its contents for enhanced usability.
✓ Customizable Settings: Tailor BlurZilla to your preferences with options to clear blurbs for specific sites or toggle blurring on and off.
✓ Privacy Assurance: Rest easy knowing that BlurZilla operates solely within the browser, without collecting any personal data.

Protect your confidential information without sacrificing convenience. Download BlurZilla now and experience seamless text blurring for heightened online privacy and security.
